Jim DeMint currently sees his role in the 2012 process, the adviser said, as`` setting the bar high'' for the presidential contenders when it comes to advocating for a small government agenda. He hasn't completely shut the door on running, and if there is a massive void in the group of candidates, who knows what could happen?, said the adviser, who was quick to caution that there is only a five percent chance the senator will run. , however, Steffen Schmidt adds that Mike Pence would still have to prove his staying power.`` What we would say to Dick Armey Mike Pence is,` Take a number,''' Steffen Schmidt said. It's like a big deli in Manhattan: If you want a sandwich, take a number. Your number is 16 or 18, because Sarah Palin and Mike Huckabee and all the rest of them already are in line in front of him. Still, a recent ABC News/Washington Post poll of potential GOP candidates shows none dominating the field. The top choices were Mike Huckabee ( 21 percent), Sarah Palin ( 19 percent) and former Massachusetts

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
